special_powers.name: HEART OF THE FELLOWSHIP
special_powers.description: Give Frodo an epic action and choose one adjacent friendly character per 100 points of the game's build total. Until your next turn, the chosen characters can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: RING-BEARER
special_powers.description: When Frodo is hit by an attack, before damage is dealt you may declare he evaded the attack. If you do, after actions resolve, deal Frodo 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: DON'T YOU LOSE HIM, SAMWISE GAMGEE!
special_powers.description: Sam can use Defend.  When a friendly character would replace its defense value with Sam's, you may first choose to replace Sam's defense value with his value +1, +2, or +3.  If you do, after actions resolve, roll a d6 and on a result of 1-3 deal Sam unavoidable damage equal to the increase.

special_powers.name: THROUGH THE WILD
special_powers.description: Give Aragon an epic action and all friendly characters can use Leap/Climb until your next turn.  At the end of your turn, one friendly character per 100 points of the game's build total may be given a move action as a free action if they have not been moved or placed this turn.

special_powers.name: PROTECTOR
special_powers.description: Any opposing character who damages a friendly character adjacent to Aragorn with a close combat attack is dealt 1 damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: FLANK
special_powers.description: Give Legolas an epic action when he occupies a square on an edge of the map. Legolas may use Phasing/Teleport to move up to 12 squares, but only through squares on the edge of the map. He can use the Carry ability and may carry one character per 100 points of the game's build total.

special_powers.name: RAPID SHOT
special_powers.description: Modify the attack value of Legolas by +2 when he makes a ranged combat attack. Modify the damage value of Legolas by +1 for each character he targets with a ranged combat attack beyond the first; each hit target must be assigned at least 1 damage.

special_powers.name: HOLD YOUR GROUND!
special_powers.description: Give Gimli an epic action. Until your next turn, Gimli and up to 1 other friendly character per 200 points of the game's build total (each of whom must be adjacent to Gimli and/or at least one other chosen character) modify their defense values by +2 and may choose to ignore knockback.

special_powers.name: LET THEM COME!
special_powers.description: When a single opposing character takes 3 or more total damage during Gimli's action, after actions resolve you may place an action token on that character.

special_powers.name: YOU CANNOT KILL THEM
special_powers.description: Ringwraith can use Invulnerability.  Modify the defense values of adjacent characters with the Nazgul keyword by the number of action tokens on Ringwraith.

special_powers.name: ORC CAPTAIN
special_powers.description: Gorbag can use Enhancement and Leadership.

special_powers.name: URUK-HAI CAPTAIN
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Shagrat and making a close combat attack can modify their attack values by +1 if not already modified by +1 or more.

special_powers.name: POWERFUL BLOW
special_powers.description: When Shagrat hits an opposing character, after actions resolve he may use Force Blast against the same target as a free action, but can't knock back a character more than 3 squares.

special_powers.name: INSTRUCTIONS FROM THE EYE
special_powers.description: Ugluk can use Perplex, but he can only target other friendly characters.

special_powers.name: TOOK-FRIEND
special_powers.description: When Merry begins your turn adjacent to a friendly character named Pippin, modify both of their speed values by +1 until the end of the turn if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: I KNOW A SHORTCUT!
special_powers.description: Merry can use Leap/Climb and the Carry ability; when he uses the Carry ability, he may carry up to three characters with a combined point value of 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: BARROW BLADE
special_powers.description: Merry can use Blades/Claws/Fangs; when he does, instead replace his damage value with half of that d6 roll, rouded up.

special_powers.name: BRANDYBUCK-FRIEND
special_powers.description: When Pippin is adjacent to a friendly character named Merry, modify both of their defense values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: FOOL OF A TOOK!
special_powers.description: Pippin can use Stealth. Give him a power action and choose up to two adjacent friendly characters and roll a d6; on a result of 1, place an action token on the chosen characters, and on a result of 4-6, the chosen characters can use Stealth until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BARROW BLADE
special_powers.description: Pippin can use Blades/Claws/Fangs; when he does, instead replace his damage value with half of that d6 roll.

special_powers.name: HORN OF GONDOR
special_powers.description: Give Boromir and epic action.  Up to one other friendly character per 100 points of the game's build total that shares a keyword with Boromir and is within 10 squares may be placed adjacent to Boromir or another character just placed by this effect.  Placed characters may not be given an action until your next turn.

special_powers.name: NUMENOREAN BLOOD
special_powers.description: Boromir can use Super Strength, but can only hold light objects.

special_powers.name: DARK PREMONITIONS
special_powers.description: Boromir can use Probability Control.  After an action resolves during which Boromir used Probability Control, roll a d6; on a result of 1-3 deal Boromir 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: RANGER CAPTAIN
special_powers.description: Faramir can use Enhancement, Running Shot, and Stealth.

special_powers.name: HE'S NOT DEAD!
special_powers.description: Faramir can use Toughness.  When turning the dial, if this click is revealed due to damage taken from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial and give Faramir an action token that doesn't deal pushing damage.

special_powers.name: MINE!
special_powers.description: Gollum can use Exploit Weakness and Plasticity.

special_powers.name: SMEAGOL
special_powers.description: Gollum can use Enhancement, Perplex and Support.  When he uses any of these powers roll 2d6 at the end of your turn, and on a result of 6 or less deal Gollum 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: WRAITHS ON WINGS
special_powers.description: Black Rider can use Phasing/Teleport, Stealth, and the Carry ability. When he uses the Carry ability, he can carry up to two characters, if they each share a keyword with him or up to four characters if they have the Nazgul keyword.

special_powers.name: FEARLESS CHARGE
special_powers.description: When Eowyn uses Charge, she ignores the effects of characters on movement and can use the Carry ability to carry a lower point value character.

special_powers.name: WHITE LADY OF ROHAN
special_powers.description: Eowyn can use Perplex and Support but only to target characters with one or more action tokens.

special_powers.name: YOU SHALL NOT PASS!
special_powers.description: Give Gandalf the Grey an epic action and place 1 SPECIAL marker per 50 points of the game's build total in squares of either the row or column that Gandalf occupies.  The first marker must be placed adjacent to Gandalf, the second adjacent to the first, etc.  Until your next turn, any opposing character that would move out of or through the marked squares must first make an attack roll of their printed attack value against Gandalf the Grey's printed defense value.  If the attack roll is unsuccessful, movement stops.  (Character may continue with the rest of their action if able.)

special_powers.name: SERVANT OF THE SECRET FIRE
special_powers.description: Gandalf the Grey can use Outwit and Perplex.  Gandalf the Grey can use Outwit a second time during your turn, but must be given a power action instead of a free action to use it.

special_powers.name: AN ARMY WORTHY OF MORDOR
special_powers.description: Give Saruman an epic action and choose 1 character per 200 points of the game's build total. If that character's attack roll this turn is 9 or higher, the damage dealt by that character is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: EMBRACE YOUR OWN DESTRUCTION!
special_powers.description: Saruman can use Poison and Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: PALANTIR
special_powers.description: Saruman can use Outwit and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: FALLEN INTO DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Servant of Sauron can use Blades/Claws/Fangs.  When he does, on a result of 1-2 on the d6 roll, until the end of the turn any attack that hits made by friendly characters with the Nazgul keyword (including this one) is a critical hit.

special_powers.name: DARK WORDS
special_powers.description: Mouth of Sauron can use Mind Control.  When he does and hits, roll a d6 after actions resolve; on a result of 5-6, deal 1 damage to the target of his Mind Control.

special_powers.name: DEMORALIZE
special_powers.description: Mouth of Sauron can use Perplex and Probability Control.  When he uses Perplex he can modify combat values only by -2 and he does not need line of fire to the target if the target is within 5 squares.

special_powers.name: WE'LL ALL HAVE ONE OF THESE "PINTS"
special_powers.description: Give Merry and Pippin an epic action; once this turn when Merry and Pippin are healed of at least 1 damage you may also heal 1 damage on all friendly characters adjacent to them.

special_powers.name: HEAL OUR HEART AND DROWN OUR WOE
special_powers.description: Merry and Pippin can use Quake; when they do the attack deals no damage and you may place an action token on each hit opposing character.

special_powers.name: LET US BE RID OF IT ONCE AND FOR ALL!
special_powers.description: All damage dealt to Frodo and Sam is reduced by the number of action tokens on them.

special_powers.name: I CAN'T CARRY IT FOR YOU, BUT I CAN CARRY YOU!
special_powers.description: Frodo and Sam can use Leap/Climb, Stealth, and the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: WE STAY TOGETHER, WE STAY OFF THE ROAD!
special_powers.description: Mr. Underhill can use Phasing/Teleport, Stealth, and the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: WE MUST NOT BE SEEN!
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Mr. Underhill can use Super Senses; when they roll a d6 for this Super Senses, on a result of 1-2 Mr. Underhill is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: ICY TOUCH
special_powers.description: Nazgul can use Exploit Weakness. Give Nazgul a power action, whenever a friendly character with the Nazgul keyword damages an opposing character this turn, place an action token on the opposing character.

special_powers.name: NINE KINGS OF MEN, DOOMED TO NEVER DIE
special_powers.description: Whenever this character or another friendly character with the Nazgul keyword is KO'd, heal 1 damage on all friendly characters with the Nazgul keyword

special_powers.name: THE BURDEN OF RINGBEARERS
special_powers.description: All friendly characters with the Ringbearer keyword who are adjacent to Ringbearer at the beginning of your turn can use Willpower until your next turn.

special_powers.name: NOTHING BUT A TRAIL OF FOOTPRINTS
special_powers.description: When Ringbearer is given a move action, he breaks away automatically and ignores the effects of characters on movement.

special_powers.name: LEAVING DECOYS
special_powers.description: Give Strider an epic action; for each 200 points of the build total, choose one friendly character next to an opposing character, place the friendly character in an unoccupied square adjacent to Strider but not adjacent to any opposing character, and place a hindering terrain marker in the square formerly occupied by the friendly character.

special_powers.name: SWORD TRAINING
special_powers.description: Strider can use Perplex, but he can only modify the combat values of other friendly characters.

special_powers.name: SCATTER THE FOE
special_powers.description: Give Esquire of Rohan an epic action.  Choose a stack of opposing horde tokens, remove one horde token from it for each 200 points of the build total, and place it in its owner's starting area.

special_powers.name: BARROW BLADE
special_powers.description: Esquire of Rohan can use Blades/Claws/Fangs; when he does, instead replace his damage value with half of the d6 roll.

special_powers.name: HE'S ALIVE!
special_powers.description: Guard of the Citadel can use Defend. When he or a friendly adjacent character uses Support, replace their attack value with their printed value +1.

special_powers.name: ON THE TRAIL
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character.  After Captain Lurtz resolves a move action, he may immediately use Charge as a free action if he can use it to attack the chosen character and does so.  If Captain Lurtz KO's the chosen character, he may choose a new opposing character.

special_powers.name: TRAMPLE
special_powers.description: For movement purposes, Olog Hai ignores characters possessing "standard damage symbol".  Once per turn, when Olog Hai moves through a square occupied by an opposing character, roll a d6; on a result of 4-6, deal the character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: CHOSEN PREY
special_powers.description: Give Witch-King of Angmar an epic action and choose an opposing character.  Modify that character's defense value by -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: RIDER IN BLACK
special_powers.description: Witch-King of Angmar can use Charge and Stealth.

special_powers.name: MORGUL BLADE
special_powers.description: Witch-King of Angmar can use Mind Control as if he had a range of 8.  Each time an opposing character takes damage from his attack, place a blade token on this card.  When he uses Mind Control, before his attack roll he may remove any number of blade tokens to modify his attack value by +1 for each removed token.

special_powers.name: THE FREE LANDS WILL FALL
special_powers.description: When Sauron attacks a stack of horde tokens and deals damage, roll a d6; on a result of 3-4 you may remove one additional token; and on a result of 5-6 you may remove two additional tokens.

special_powers.name: FROZEN WITH FEAR
special_powers.description: Give Sauron an epic action and choose one opposing character for each 200 points of the build total. Until your next turn, the chosen characters cannot be given move actions or power actions unless there are no other opposing characters.

special_powers.name: THE SHADOW ACROSS THE LAND
special_powers.description: Sauron can use Phasing/Teleport. When he does, after actions resolve he may make a close combat attack modifying his attack value by -2.

special_powers.name: ONE RING TO RULE THEM ALL
special_powers.description: Sauron can use Pulse Wave as if he had a range value of 10. When he uses Pulse Wave and hits, you may give the hit character an action token instead of dealing damage.

special_powers.name: RING OF POWER
special_powers.description: Unless this power is countered, Sauron's other powers and abilities cannot be countered. Sauron can use Exploit Weakness, Outwit and Perplex.

special_powers.name: HORDE: SWARM
special_powers.description: When stacked give Orcs a power action and as a free action you may unstack any number of Orcs tokens and move each up to (S) squares.

special_powers.name: HORDE: FEARSOME ATTACK
special_powers.description: When stacked and Uruk-Hai hits a character with a close combat attack, after actions resolve you may place an action token on up to (S) adjacent opposing characters (these tokens do not deal pushing damage.)

special_powers.name: HORDE: FANG AND BLADE
special_powers.description: When stacked and Warg Riders use Blades/Claws/Fangs, they deal a minimum (S) damage.

special_powers.name: HORDE: BATTLEFIELD MOBILITY
special_powers.description: When stacked, Riders of Rohan may use the Carry ability to carry up to (S) characters.

special_powers.name: HORDE: AMBUSH
special_powers.description: When stacked Ithilen Rangers replace their speed value with 8 + (S).

special_powers.name: HORDE: UNMATCHED RANGE
special_powers.description: When stacked, Haldir's Archers replace their range value with 8 + (S).

special_powers.name: HORDE: RESCUE FLIGHT
special_powers.description: When stacked, Eagle replaces their speed value with 8 + (S).  When (M), Eagles may use the Carry ability to begin carrying a character in any square they move through.

special_powers.name: HORDE: BREAK THE DAM!
special_powers.description: When stacked, any close combat attack made by Ent destroys up to (S) squares of adjacent blocking terrain after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: HORDE: GHOSTLY CHARGE
special_powers.description: When stacked, Dead Man of Dunharrow can use Charge.  When (M) and they use Charge, damage dealt by the close combat attack is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: HORDE: TRAMPLE
special_powers.description: When stacked, Mumakil ignores the effects of hindering terrain and characters on movement.  When (M), after actions resolve, deal 1 damage to each opposing character occupying a square Mumakil moved through.

special_powers.name: HORDE: FIRE!
special_powers.description: When stacked, Orc Catapult replaces their range value with 8 + (S).  When (M) and Orc Catapult uses Energy Explosion, damage dealt to the character in the target square is penetrating.

special_powers.name: HORDE: SMASH!
special_powers.description: When stacked and attacking with an object, modify Mountain Troll's attack value by + (S).  When (M), Mountain Trolls treat light objects as heavy objects when attacking with an object.
Frodo, Frodo and Sam, Gollum, Mr. Underhill, Ringbearer, Sauron.
special_powers.name: Owner

special_powers.description: The character controlling The One Ring can use Leadership, Probability Control and Stealth. At the end of each turn of the character controlling The One Ring, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. On a roll of 1, the character places The One Ring in its square and is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.
